author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Bakthi Sorpozhivu Mandram : Villibharatham Discourse, Kongu Nadu Arts and Science College, 6.30 p.m.

Shri Pattatharasiamman Temple : Thiruppavai chant, Kasturipalayam Road, Perianayackem Palayam, 5 a.m.

Thiruvenkatavan Charitable Society : Margazhi Mahotsavam, Sri Venugopalaswamy Temple, 5.20 a.m.

Shri Rathna Vinayagar Temple : 'Visakham' event, D.B road, R.S. Puram, 8:30 a.m.

GENERAL

Nehru Arts and Science College : Workshop on Quantitative Aptitude and Logical Reasoning, Seminar Hall, college premises, 9.30 a.m.

National Federation of Printing, Stationery and Publication Employees : Bi-Ennial Conference, Com Ajit Chowdhury Manch Govt of India Press Auditorium, 10 a.m.

PSG College of Technology: Conference on Applied Mathematical models-ICAMM, D block conference hall, 9 a.m.

Bharathiar University: Workshop on Endangered languages in the Western Ghats of Tamil Nadu, Language block, 11 a.m.

TIRUPUR

Angel College of Engineering and Technology: Entrepreneurship development programme, 10 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
